Title: Flask App Deployment to Simple Server
Overall_Summary: This project outlines the deployment of a Flask application to a basic web server for public access.
Original_Goal: I need to deploy my flask app to a simple server so others can see it on the web.  I need a short plan for this.

Detailed_Outline.name: Step 1: Server Selection & Setup
Detailed_Outline.content: Choose a suitable server (e.g., Heroku, PythonAnywhere) and create an account.

Detailed_Outline.name: Step 2: Environment Preparation
Detailed_Outline.content: Set up the necessary server-side environment (e.g., Python, Flask, required libraries).

Detailed_Outline.name: Step 3: Application Deployment
Detailed_Outline.content: Deploy the Flask application code to the chosen server.

Detailed_Outline.name: Step 4: Server Configuration
Detailed_Outline.content: Configure the server to run the Flask application (e.g., WSGI configuration).

Detailed_Outline.name: Step 5: Testing and Verification
Detailed_Outline.content: Test the deployed application to ensure proper functionality and accessibility.

Detailed_Outline.name: Step 6: Domain Name Configuration (Optional)
Detailed_Outline.content: Link a custom domain name to the deployed application (if desired).
